events.message: I received my order yesterday, but I want to return it and get a refund because it does not meet my expectations.
The reported issue was categorized as a refund request based on the customer stating they want to return the product.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request for order #45893.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want to return your order and request a refund. I'm here to help you with that.
Could you please provide the reason for the return and whether the item has been opened or used? This will help us process the refund faster.
The product arrived damaged and does not work as described. I have not used it and would like a full refund immediately.
We apologize for the inconvenience caused. We will initiate the refund process right away once you provide the return shipment details.
Thank you for the quick response and your help. I will send back the product today and share the tracking number shortly.
We have received the returned product and processed your refund. You should see the amount credited to your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm if you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund has been processed and there have been no further concerns, we will now close this case. Thank you for contacting support.
